thread.title: Great place to stay in Rome
thread.title_full: Great place to stay in Rome - Review of Hotel Oceania, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Cyndi7751
title: Great place to stay in Rome
text: We stayed 6 nights and found this property to be perfect for our needs. It was clean and inexpensive and more roomy than places we have stayed in Paris for far more money. Breakfast was ample for continental fare and the beds were nice and firm. We asked for extra pillows which really helped as the first were pretty flat. We would totally stay here again if we come to Rome.
